memberdef.argsstring: (int iK, double vmin, double vmax, Q eps_p, double Delta, char type) -> Q
memberdef.name: correctionFunctionSelfEnergy_Keldysh

detaileddescription.para:
Helper function for computing the analytical result for the asymptotic tails of the loop integral, assuming the self-energy of the propagator to be decayed to the Hartree value. See the function asymp_corrections_loop below.
iK
: Type of the loop propagator 0: G^R, 1: G^A, 2: G^K
vmin
: Lower limit of the numerically evaluated integral
vmax
: Upper limit of the numerically evaluated integral
Sigma_H
: Hartree self-energy
Delta
: Hybridization (~ flow parameter) at which the bubble is evaluated
type
: Propagator type ('g': full, 's': single-scale)
: Analytical result of the integrated tails

memberdef.argsstring: (int iK, double vmin, double vmax, double eps_p, double Delta, char type) -> double
memberdef.name: correctionFunctionSelfEnergy_Keldysh
